argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idlsubcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | idlsubcl.2 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran G = ran G |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_idlcl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) -> A e. ran G ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_idlcl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ B e. I ) -> B e. ran G ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_anim12da | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> ( A e. ran G /\ B e. ran G ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 7, 2 | #P_rngosub | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. ran G /\ B e. ran G ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. ran G /\ B e. ran G ) ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. ran G /\ B e. ran G ) ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> A e. I ) |
| 13 | 1, 7 | #P_idlnegcl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ B e. I ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. I ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantrl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. I ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> ( A e. I /\ ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. I ) ) |
| 16 | 1 | #P_idladdcl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. I ) ) -> ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) e. I ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) e. I ) |
| 18 | 11, 17 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. I ) ) -> ( A D B ) e. I ) |
